cause.description:
The United Nations, founded after WWII to "save succeeding generations from the scourge of war," is one of the things standing between world peace and world war. It also provides millions every day with food and humanitarian aid, as well as medical assistance, economic and political aid, and military protections.
Americans must support the United Nations if either the UN or the United States are to achieve full security and thrive in the future.
Note: Donations to this cause benefit the United Nations Foundation. For more information on the Foundation, please visit their website: http://www.unfoundation.org/
1. The United Nations is vital to preventing war around the world.
2. The United Nations improves the lives of millions every day through its humanitarian work.
3. The United States must be more closely involved with the United Nations in order to restore American prestige in the world and project American influence.
cause.mission: Our mission is to support both the United Nations and American involvement in it.
cause.name: Support the United Nations
